attributes.action: provide transport in North Dorset to our nearest hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please can we have some hospital transport for the elderly and disabled people in North Dorset.  Our nearest hospitals are Yeovil 22 miles and Salisbury 27 miles approx.  There are no bus services to either of these hospitals where we could use our bus pass which makes visiting or keeping appointments very costly and difficult.
